title: Re: wip
content:
Oh MAN Genius 314. Your BwB P\/\/N35 mine!

I finally finished my BwB after a few days of working on it. (Finding the right piece is a pain!) I tried to get it as close as possible to how it looks in Keen 4-6. I even added retractable landing gear. After seeing G314's BwB though, I saw I needed something more. So I went ahead and made my own Commander Keen to go with it. I also made a pogo stick and a wrist computer. I couldn't find the correct piece to make a neural stunner (green) so I made the death ray from Keen 1.

Then I figured I might as well stretch my imagination and make Mortimer's ship and a Mortimer lego man as well. So I did that. (That took a lot less time for some reason.)

I tried making other things like Molly McMire and a yorp but they didn't turn out too well.

Can't find the digital camera right now so I'll look for it tomorrow. Now I really need to get back to making my comic. I'll be gone for a few days as I disconnect the interent, unistall all my games and glue my hand to the wacom tablet pen.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] -----------------------
"The Adventures of Commander Keen" issue #1: [img]http://img300.imageshack.us/img300/3791/yorpcopy0yu.gif[/img](new teaser 7/26)

title: Re: wip
content: It took two tries to get it right. The first time wasn't as good, and i eventually took it apart. The like half a year later i tried rebuilding it, and it was so much better.-Genius314

title: Re: wip
content:
Sorry I took so long getting these pics but I could NOT find the digital camera ANYWHERE! Finally I figured out that my parents took it on their 2 week vacation. ([img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] ) So I dug up the old web cam and took some pictures with that. (double [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] ) I apologize for the horrible picture quality. I took a few pictures from different angles so hopefully you will get the idea.

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/2716/bwb19zl.png[/img]
All of the details on Commander Keen got removed [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] The pogo stick is leaning up against the wing

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/9664/bwb21yq.png[/img]
The stick on the left got bent over. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] I was going to build it in a way that would of been unbendable, but I couldn't find enough pieces for both sides

[img]http://img312.imageshack.us/img312/3185/bwback9zw.png[/img]

[img]http://img312.imageshack.us/img312/2940/bwblandinggear9dw.png[/img]
Demonstrating the variable landing gear.
There was a rather noticeable aesthetic piece missing that I didn't realize was off until after taking the pictures. Can you find it?

On to the Mortimer BwB (Hey I don't know what it's called)

[img]http://img312.imageshack.us/img312/3702/bwbmort18wx.png[/img]
I should of had a better background

[img]http://img312.imageshack.us/img312/1967/bwbmort21uv.png[/img]

[img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/6253/bwbmortfront2gx.png[/img]

[img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/7442/bwbmortgearup3pa.png[/img]
It looks even more wicked in real life. (yes the ladder retracts too.)

[img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/8466/bwbmortbottom5mq.png[/img]-----------------------
